option.name: exacFile
option.description: Path to Exac VCF file. At the time of writing, you'd better use a normalized version of Exac (see https://github.com/lindenb/jvarkit/wiki/VCFFixIndels )

option.name: ifNotInExacThenDiscard
option.description: if variant was not found in Exac, discard the variant (set the FILTER). Default: don't set the FILTER.

option.name: maxFreq
option.description: set FILTER if max(exac frequency in any pop) is greater than this value)

app.documentation:
Variant in that VCF should have one and only one ALT allele. Use https://github.com/lindenb/jvarkit/wiki/VcfMultiToOneAllele if needed.
Output
INFO column
FreqExac : Exac frequency.
AC_* and AN_*: Transpose original population data from original Exac file
FILTER column
BurdenF3 : if FreqExac doesn't fit the criteria maxFreq
see also
VcfBurdenFilter2
